clinical_study.brief_title: A Pilot Study of the Envision® Surface
clinical_study.official_title: A Pilot Study of the Envision® Surface in a Patient Population at High Risk for or Who Have Pressure Ulcers: Evaluation of Pressure Ulcer Incidence, Changes in Existing Pressure Ulcers, Clinical Staff Satisfaction and Patient Comfort

brief_summary.textblock: This study is to evaluate the clinical safety and effectiveness of the Envision® surface.

detailed_description.textblock: This study is to evaluate the clinical safety and effectiveness of the Envision® surface placed on the TotalCare® frame in pressure ulcer prevention and management, patient comfort, and staff acceptance in the critical care environment

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subject weighs between 70 and 400 pounds Subject to remain on Envision Surface for at least 3 days Subject at risk for pressure ulcers (Braden Score < 14) or has existing ulcer of any stage Subject is able to provide voluntary consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subject requires pulmonary treatment surface Subject declines consent
